title: LLM4Material
subtitle: Guangzhou Municipal Key Laboratory of Materials Informatics
details: This work is dedicated to the development of LLM with reasoning for use in the field of materials science.
Promising results in the field of perovskites by using a small number of high-quality samples for SFT.
Using the Rule-based Method and DPO, the model can output professional answers that are better than R1.

title: Super-Resolution for Remote sensing
subtitle: Graduation Project, Score: 97
details: This work became a candidate for excellent graduation thesis in the school (top 3%).
Explore the applicability of current reconstruction metrics in remote sensing image tasks, and use CLIP's image encoder for semantic evaluation of reconstruction quality.
Proposed a multi-frame remote sensing image super-resolution network based on swin-transformer.

title: Pneumonia Detection Assistant
subtitle: Software registration(2023SR0640606)
details: This work won the third prize in the OpenCV 2022 Competition held by OpenCV Company.
Implemented case identification and lesion segmentation for lung images through VGGNet and BiSeNetv2 algorithms, with an accuracy of 92% and an imou of 0.6162.
Used ONNX and PyQt to deploy the model and developed a cross-platform software.

title: Unmanned disinfection vehicle based on ROS
subtitle: National 1st Prize
details: In response to the COVID-19 pandemic at the time, an unmanned disinfection vehicle based on ROS was designed, which can be controlled by a handle and a computer and automatically avoid obstacles.
Mainly responsible for the physical structure design, circuit design and peripheral circuit control of the sterilizer.
